content: Is there a link for people to sign up for text banking?  I have multiple people interested in this

Here's a link to several text banking events.  https://events.democrats.org/?event_type=3
Mobilize
Join an event near you! · The Democratic National Committee on Mobi...
Find events, petitions, volunteer opportunities, fundraisers and more with The Democratic National Committee.

[5:07 AM]
I'd also suggest going to the ⁠text-team-welcome channel to get more information about how to get involved with texting.  We are concentrated on phone banking on this channel.  Glad you want to participate!
